name: Family = Trouble
text:
You may flip to alter-ego form. Choose:
. Summon the hero-specific Hawkeye ally and remove him from the game → remove Family = Trouble from the game.
. Remove all arrow counters from Kate's Bow. You cannot place arrow counters on Kate's Bow until the end of the next round. Discard this obligation.

name: Finding the Perfect LMD
text:
While this scheme is in play, threat cannot be prevented from being placed on a scheme and Madame Masque cannot take damage.
[crisis]
flavor: Madame masque has managed to get her hands on more Life Model Decoys ans is causing havok with you image!

name: Madame Masque
text: [star] Madame Masque's ATK and SCH are equal to the ATK and THW, respectively, of the hero form of the identity she is engaged with. (Hawkeye's Nemesis Minion.)

name: Masque's Minions
text: Guard. Forced Interrupt: When this minion would be defeated, place 1 minion counter on it and heal all damage from him. Forced Interrupt: When this minion has 2 or more counters on it, discard it.

name: Golden Shot
text: When Revealed: Take 1 damage. Then, take 1 indirect damage for each frienly character you control [star] Boost: Reveal this card.
flavor: "You don't like the odds? You change them!" - Madame Masque
